page.title: 07Halesworth Hospital
page.content: The Patrick Stead Hospital is a cottage hospital situated in Bungay Rd, Halesworth.It can take 31 people,10 of those are maternity patients.The services available are chiropodists, radiographer and physiotherapist.There is also a dark-room technician,visiting dietcian,2 orthapedic surgeons,a consultant,chest physician,social worker and speech therapist.There is a 24 hour casualty and out-patient emergency service,a maternity,family planning and antinatal clinic,parent- craft clinics,chiropody,orthopaedic and chest clinics.There are also facilities for private patients.The hospital's league of friend provide extra comforts.They hope to have a new dining room built with the funds they raised from the hospitals fete each year.
